name: places/ChIJ9wpKuIJZwokRD8MzXv-XRcA
formattedAddress: 345 E 12th St, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 345 E 12th St, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text:
Buy at your own risk - If you dare

This review is based on my personal experience so make your own conclusions. I have owned my Wing Freedom X for just under one year and have had many issues. First customer service is contacted by email and it could be a few days before they get back to you. Most replacement parts come from China and take about a month to get if your lucky. Labor to replace the defective parts is your responsibility no matter how many times it takes to resolve the issue. This bike is a lot louder than most comparable E-bikes that I have rode.

Here is a list and dates of the issues I have dealt with.

1/10/23 = Received delivery of E-bike & I assembled in about 2 hours

1/11/23 = Gears not working - Bike shop adjusted derailleur

1/12/23 = Noticed display chipped / Wing ordered new display / new display finally received 3/6/23 &  I installed

2/03/23 = Pedal assist not working / Wing says I need a new controller, part ordered 2/17/23 / Part received 2/23/23 & installed / Still no pedal assist - Wing ordered new torque sensor part 2/23/23 /  Torque sensor part received 3/03/23 & installed 3/09/23 / Part works but is loud

5/31/23 = Brakes weak & noises / Adjusted brakes

9/06/23 = Alarm malfunctioning / Wing ordered new alarm 9/06/23 / New alarm received 10/17/23 & installed

9/07/23 = Pedal assist loud noise / Wing says lubricate planetary gears 9/14/23 / Gears lubricated - still noise / Wing ordered new torque sensor 10/24 / 2nd torque sensor part received 12/10/23 & installed / Noise still exists

originalText.text:
I have now owned the Freedom X for several weeks and have taken a number of long rides. The bike is everything I had hoped. It took a little time but was relatively easy to assemble. I added the rear rack, fenders, phone holder and throttle. Those components really enhance the bike.
The rides have been a blast. I still peddle continuously but now when riding into the wind or up steep  hills, I get a nice assist. I typically ride on the first or second setting which prolongs the battery and gives enough of a boost, but I'm still getting a good workout. The bike is great looking and I get a lot of compliments. I strongly recommend Wing Bikes in a market that is crowded with inferior E-bikes.

The rides have been a blast. I still peddle continuously but now when riding into the wind or up steep  hills, I get a nice assist. I typically ride on the first or second setting which prolongs the battery and gives enough of a boost, but I'm still getting a good workout. The bike is great looking and I get a lot of compliments. I strongly recommend Wing Bikes in a market that is crowded with inferior E-bikes.

originalText.text: I LOVE my Wing bike so much that I ended up buying two more, and also getting several friends to buy them as well. The bikes are a great shape -- comfortable but still feel performant when you want to take the power down and get a bit more of a workout. I find myself using it for all my commuting -- to work, out to dinner or events in the evenings, to meet friends, everything. I love how the headlight and taillight are such great illumination and are built straight into the bike in the simplest way. It means that when I go out in the evening I feel really comfortable that I will be visible riding home, and I don't have to remember to bring any lights along. It's also really nice that it's a normal bike that you can reach all the parts - so maintenance is easy at any bike shop (or on your own), and yet it still has a very sleek design. You get so much for your money with this bike! I have put nearly a thousand miles on mine in less than a year. It gives me so much joy! And I will also say the customer service is excellent and prompt. They are truly a customer focused company, both in providing a fantastic product and supporting issues and questions if you have them. I could not recommend this bike more!

originalText.text: My husband and I purchased the Wing Freedom bikes a couple of years ago, and we have been absolutely loving the product. The bikes have amazing range in speeds, from small pedal assist to super speedy. The bikes are beautiful and we always feel so slick riding around the city. We get so many compliments and love the low profile compared to bulky e-bikes. We ride them all over New York City and love it and have brought them to Burning man for a couple of years. They do great at both. 10/10 recommend this bike.

originalText.text: Love, love, love this bike!   Initially, I thought that I wouldn't get enough exercise on an electric bike and was a little wary when i received it for my birthday, but I was totally wrong.  This bike is light enough that you can easily peddle it (unlike some of the other electric bikes out there) without assist if you want.  However, since I know that I can get help if I want it, it has encouraged me to go on much longer bike rides than I would have even considered before owning the Freedom ST.  My son, used to work at a bike rental place & was the one that recommend Wing Bikes.  As I am in my late 60's and have been active all of my life and love being outdoors, this has been a real blessing.  After seeing how much I like this bike and having tried it out himself, my husband now, also, owns a Freedom ST!  Would recommend it to anyone considering an electric bike!!!
